<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<LightningComponentBundle xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata">
    <apiVersion>59.0</apiVersion>
    <isExposed>true</isExposed>
    <masterLabel>Navigate to Record Page</masterLabel>
    <targets>
        <target>lightning__FlowScreen</target>
    </targets>
    <targetConfigs>
        <targetConfig targets="lightning__FlowScreen">
            <property
                name="recordId"
                label="Record Id"
                type="String"
                required="true"
                role="inputOnly"
            />
        </targetConfig>
    </targetConfigs>
</LightningComponentBundle>

messages.message: Parsing error: This experimental syntax requires enabling one of the following parser plugin(s): "jsx", "flow", "typescript". (1:0)

source:
<template>
    <lightning-layout vertical-align="center" class="slds-var-m-top_x-small">
        <lightning-layout-item size="2">
            <template lwc:if={isNotFirstPage}>
                <lightning-button-icon
                    class="left-button-icon"
                    icon-name="utility:chevronleft"
                    onclick={handlePrevious}
                >
                    <label>Previous</label>
                </lightning-button-icon>
            </template>
        </lightning-layout-item>
        <lightning-layout-item size="8" class="nav-info slds-text-align_center">
            {totalItemCount} items  page {currentPageNumber} of {totalPages}
        </lightning-layout-item>
        <lightning-layout-item size="2" class="nav-next slds-text-align_right">
            <template lwc:if={isNotLastPage}>
                <lightning-button-icon
                    class="right-button-icon"
                    icon-name="utility:chevronright"
                    onclick={handleNext}
                >
                    <label>Next</label>
                </lightning-button-icon>
            </template>
        </lightning-layout-item>
    </lightning-layout>
</template>

    <isExposed>false</isExposed>
</LightningComponentBundle>

messages.message: Parsing error: This experimental syntax requires enabling one of the following parser plugin(s): "jsx", "flow", "typescript". (1:0)

source:
<template>
    <lightning-card title={address} icon-name="custom:custom106">
        <template lwc:if={markers}>
            <lightning-map
                map-markers={markers}
                zoom-level={zoomLevel}
            ></lightning-map>
            <template lwc:if={error}>
                <c-error-panel
                    friendly-message="Error retrieving map"
                    errors={error}
                ></c-error-panel>
            </template>
        </template>
        <template lwc:else>
            <c-error-panel
                friendly-message="Select a property to see its location"
            ></c-error-panel>
        </template>
    </lightning-card>
</template>
